trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that raised the event.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件模型[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]根據具有與其處理常式連接事件的事件委派。

trans-unit.source: To raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, two elements are needed:
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class, derived from <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which holds the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>類別、 衍生自<xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其中保留的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler> delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler>委派，它會指向提供為了回應事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
